metadata.title: CVE-2024-7540 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: oFono AT CMGL Command Uninitialized Variable Information DisclosureVulnerability. This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclosesensitive information on affected installations of oFono. An attacker mustfirst obtain the ability to execute code on the target modem in order toexploit this vulnerability.The specific flaw exists within the parsing of responses from AT+CMGLcommands. The issue results from the lack of proper initialization ofmemory prior to accessing it. An attacker can leverage this in conjunctionwith other vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context ofroot. Was ZDI-CAN-23307.

criterions.comment: ofono package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
